titleStmt.title: Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that the boursers and treasurers of the colledges in Oxforde shall retaine and keepe such monyes as they have received
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: At head of sheet: Die Veneris, 21 April, 1648.
Signed: Hen. Elsyng, Cler. Parl. Dom. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
